mapper.select: SELECT level, rownum, a.* FROM repboard a START WITH parent_no = 0 CONNECT BY prior no = parent_no ORDER siblings by no desc
SELECT level, rownum, a.* FROM repboard a WHERE level <= 2 START WITH no = #{no} CONNECT BY prior no = parent_no ORDER siblings BY no DESC
SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT level, rownum, a.* FROM repboard a START WITH parent_no = 0 CONNECT BY prior no = parent_no ORDER siblings BY no DESC)b WHERE subject LIKE '%${value}%'
SELECT * FROM repboard WHERE parent_no = 0 ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repboard (no, parent_no, subject, content, password) VALUES (repboard_seq.NEXTVAL,#{parent_no},#{subject},#{content},#{password})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM repboard WHERE no=#{no} AND password=#{password}
